summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2916 for the improvement of Donald Street, from California Avenue to Forty-fourth Avenue Southwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 35250, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
